loading_mask.label: Enable Loading Mask
loading_mask.comment: If set to Yes, you will see preloader screen before site loaded.

loading_mask_font_size.label: Font Size
loading_mask_font_size.comment: You should provide size unit as well, for example '100px', '7em'.

loading_mask_image.label: Loading Image
loading_mask_image.comment: Allowed file types: ICO, PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG, APNG, SVG. Not all browsers support all these formats!

top_links.label: Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: My Account, My Wishlist, Log In etc.

hover_image.label: Show Another Image When Hovering
hover_image.comment: Show another image on mouse hover over the main image.

hover_image_colname.label: Column Name
hover_image_colname.comment: You can specify another image by setting this and value below.

hover_image_colvalue.label: Column Value
hover_image_colvalue.comment: Show image as alternative, which has property pairing with above column name.

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to use Quick View feature.

sidebar_blocks.label: Disable Sidebar Blocks
sidebar_blocks.comment: In this section you can disable custom blocks which are displayed in sidebars.

enable.label: Show Facebook Like Box
enable.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to show a facebook like box.

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: You can find custom.css file in "skin/frontend/fengo/default/css" directory.

import_blocks.label: Import Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: In order to overwrite existing blocks, please save configuration with this value 'Yes', and then click "Import Static Blocks" button.

import_pages.label: Import CMS Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: In order to overwrite existing pages, please save configuration with this value 'Yes', and then click "Import Pages" button.

footer_links.label: Disable: Footer Links
footer_links.comment: Links in the footer: Site Map, Orders and Returns, Contact Us etc.

viewport_bg_color.label: Viewport Background Color
viewport_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

bg_color.label: Page Background Color
bg_color.comment: Background color applied for all sections of the page: header, main content area and footer

button_active_bg_color.label: Button Active Background Color
button_active_bg_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

button_active_color.label: Button Active Text Color
button_active_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

primary_font_size.label: Basic Font Size
primary_font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Basic Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif.
Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment:
Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts
Important: most of the fonts from Google are not available in all weights. Make sure that you specified correct weight (field Font Weight below) for selected font. Otherwise font will not be displayed. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

primary_char_subset.label: Character Sets
primary_char_subset.comment:
Some of the fonts support multiple scripts (like Latin and Cyrillic for example). You need to select at least one character set.
Important: not all fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets refer to Google Web Fonts.
Important: using multiple character sets affects performance, so only select the character sets that you actually need.

primary_font_weight.label: Basic Font Weight
primary_font_weight.comment:
Specify the weight of the font. You can only use numeric font weights which are available for the CSS property font-weight. E.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.
Important: if you selected a font from Google Fonts, note that some fonts are not available in all weights. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

header.label: Header
header.comment: In this tab, you can configure the header section of the page located at the very top.

top_margin_top.label: Gap at the Top
top_margin_top.comment: Specify additional gap above the header top section. Value in pixels.

top_margin_bottom.label: Gap at the Bottom
top_margin_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below the header top section. Value in pixels.

main_margin_top.label: Gap at the Top
main_margin_top.comment: Specify additional gap above the header main section. Value in pixels.

main_margin_bottom.label: Gap at the Bottom
main_margin_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below the header main section. Value in pixels.

first_font_size.label: Item Font Size
first_font_size.comment: Font size of the top level items. Values in Pixels.

second_font_size.label: Item Font Size
second_font_size.comment: Font size of the second level items. Values in Pixels.

third_font_size.label: Item Font Size
third_font_size.comment: Font size of the third level items. Values in Pixels.

category.label: Category View
category.comment: In this tab, you can configure category page.

footer.label: Footer
footer.comment: In this tab, you can configure the footer section of the page located at the bottom.

install_theme.label: Install Theme
install_theme.comment: Click this button to install Fengo Theme.

demo_style.label: Demo Style
demo_style.comment: You don't need to save this config. Please select your type and then click Activate Button (with/without saving).<script type="text/javascript">jQuery('.demo-style').on('change', function(){var onclck = jQuery('button.btn-install-demo').attr('onclick'); onclck = onclck.replace(/style\/type[0-9]*/g, 'style/' + jQuery(this).val()); jQuery('button.btn-install-demo').attr('onclick', onclck);});</script>

install_demos.label: Activate Demo
install_demos.comment: Click this button to install Demo specified by above style.
